events.message: The applicant submitted the loan application to cover medical expenses incurred during recent treatment.
Loan application was categorised under Personal Loan based on the stated purpose for medical bills payment.
Loan officer Jane Martinez assigned to oversee the medical personal loan application process.
First review completed, verifying applicant details and loan amount requested specifically for medical debt relief.
Applicant was asked to provide medical bills, proof of income, and identification documents to proceed.
All requested documents including invoices from hospital and income statements were successfully submitted.
Creditworthiness evaluation completed with an average credit score supporting the requested loan amount.
Risk assessment conducted and categorized risk level as moderate based on debt-to-income ratio and credit history.
A loan offer specifying interest rate and repayment terms was presented to the applicant for the medical loan.
Applicant accepted the loan terms and confirmed willingness to proceed with the medical personal loan offered.
The loan was officially approved after final compliance and documentation checks were concluded.
The approved loan amount was successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for medical debt payment.
Follow-up call made to ensure the applicant received funds and to clarify repayment schedule if needed.
The loan application process was formally closed after confirming the applicant’s satisfaction and all loan conditions met.
